General.Name: Zhejiang Cayi Vacuum Container Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Cayi Vacuum Container Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of beverage and food containers of various materials in China. The company's products include stainless steel vacuum insulation utensils, including vacuum flask, vacuum bottle, food jar, travel bottle, sports bottle, digital bottle, etc.; stainless steel utensils; plastic utensils; glassware; and other new materials for daily beverages and food containers. It also exports its products to various countries, such as the United States, South Korea, Brazil, Norway, the Netherlands, Japan, and Canada, as well as other European, American, and East Asian countries. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Jinhua, China.
